professional_summary: Relational database administrator with expertise in SharePoint, data analysis, and process optimization. Proven track record in managing large-scale database projects and streamlining business operations through efficient data management strategies.

key_responsibilities: Production planning and control as a leased programmer on-site.
Data warehouse optimization and SAP integration.
Providing exceptional customer service and resolving billing questions.
Analyzing accounts to make recommendations and processing device upgrades.
Consolidating business processes into a single repository for real-time data sharing.
Integrating and syncing data across various platforms and departments.
